messages.messageBody:
Thanks, I ordered a subscription a few days ago and a back issue as
well. I just got confirmation today that it went through ...I had
trouble ordering because I have an apo address. Hopefully I'll get
them.
Michelle


--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., starsuncloud@c... wrote:
> In a message dated 9/20/02 11:34:16 AM Central Daylight Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@y... writes:
>
> << I don't know off of the top of my head if you can order a
single issue
> when it's the current issue. But I think you can order back
issues. >>
>
> Yes, you can order back issues for around $6.
> I think it's a good one to subscribe to also!!
> Sandra has a regular column now. Very cool.
>
> Ren

messages.subject: HEM
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/20/02 11:34:16 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/20/02 11:34:16 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I don't know off of the top of my head if you can order a single issue
when it's the current issue. But I think you can order back issues. >>

Yes, you can order back issues for around $6.
I think it's a good one to subscribe to also!!
Sandra has a regular column now. Very cool.

Ren
